caption.p: Maximum efficacy landscape of oseltamivir with respect to the drug parameters. The two recommended regimens, curative (75 mg, twice/day) and epidemic use (150 mg, twice/day), are shown. Contour lines mark the level of efficacy that can be theoretically achieved given a combination of the drug elimination rate and half-maximum concentration. The nominal value indicates the efficacy calculated based on currently reported values of the two parameters [ 20].
